climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: LUXURIOUS PILLOWCASE:One Side Of The Pillowcase is Comfortable Surface.And The Other Side Is Cool-fabric Surface(It is Made of Proprietary Ice Silky Fabric that Feels Cool to the touch).The Breathable Cover Keeps Your Pillows Dry and Provide Maximum Comfort. It keep you cool during summer months and warm you up when its cold season.

FILLING-The filler material Made from Premium infused Gel particles Memory Foam and Microfiber blend.memory foam is new, clean , no odor,certified by CertiPUR-US. The Breathable memory form is an eco-conscious, high-performance material, offering exceptional resilience, durability, and temperature control. It’s one of the most healthy, chemical-free pillows that you can buy

ADJUSTABLE-Our pillows can be adjusted freely by yourself, providing personalized support to your head, neck and shoulders, relieving pain and enhancing your sleep. There is a zipper on the side of bed pillow. You can open it and remove fillings through it.
ERGONOMICALLY-Our pillows are ergonomically designed to optimally fit all types of sleepers and provide enhanced neck and head support while you sleep

NEVER FLAT & 1 YEARS WARRANTY:We are very confident about the quality of our soft pillow. We pride 30 Nights Risk Free Trail and 1 year warranty. If for any reason you are not satisfied, please contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VAINOC Memory Foam Pillows Due to an increase in the demand for sleeping quality, we break the stereotypes of traditional pillows and create the personalized pillows for customers, which makes users have an excellent sleep.
Quality fillings are an important part of the pillow, and we refuse to use recycled contaminated fillings.
Side sleepers need a higher, firmer pillow that supports the head and eases pressure on the shoulders.
Previous page Next page 1 Pillowcase A/B sides 2 Adequate support 3 Machine washable

VAINOC Pillows uses premium shredded foam allows the pillow to let air through every area, and is infused temperature regulating cooling gel particles into the foam to alleviate excessive heat build-up

The pillows arrive compress packed. For optimal use, prep as below: 1. Open the plastic wrap and remove the pillows 2. Please unwrap and fluff it up manually to its full size by kneading apping and shaking. Please give 48-72 hours to the pillow to fully expand. 3. By placing the pillows in the sun for a few hours on a bright day will evaporate the moisture that builds up overnight, and the pillows will fluff up over the day and to make sure your pillows become fluffier and softer. 4. There will be a slight material flavor after opening, please don’t worry that they are harmless. Air for a few hours to eliminate trapped odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have purchased 6!
reviews.reviewText: Love these pillows. They are so supportive and have a cooling side. One is perfect for side sleeping! I use another for my hips and knees. The entire family loves them. Slip a pillow case on and they never need attention again besides your head laying on it and an occasional change of case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable pillows at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pillows to replace one that I paid $80 dollars for. These are much better and the perfect level of softness and firmness for all types of sleepers. Great bargain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One pillow covering damaged
reviews.reviewText: I thought I'd first point out that one of my zippered pillow coverings was badly torn. This didn't happen during shipping as it was damaged before it was vacuum-sealed. I tried to get in contact to hopefully get a replacement, but since Amazon themselves fulfilled the order, my only recourse was to return both pillows (now fully fluffed up) to get a refund. I don't want to return the pillows, I just want a replacement for the cover. I guess I'll be pulling out the old sewing kit.As for the pillows themselves... not bad. Not the softest things I've ever put my head on, but pretty comfortable. I had to remove a significant amount of foam to get it to the right level for me. That leaves a bunch of extra memory foam that I can use for cushions, or lumbar support, or wrist rests. I can't speak to how "cooling" these pillows are since it's freezing cold where I live right now, but I haven't gotten overly hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these pillows. $25 for 2 pillows is a great bargain. They come shrink wrapped and are flat when taken out of the box, but once out of the plastic, they magically puff up in a few minutes. Unlike other reviewers, I did not have to remove extra filling. I like the firmness and the height of these pillows. One reviewer said there was a funny smell, but for me there was no smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These Pillow's are the best I have ever used ! The cooling effect is phenomenal , didn't have to remove and memory foam , I just use one pillow instead of two , yeay ! SOoo comfortable , cooling and cushy . The only thing is there is a slight smell like mildewy but dissipated as of right now 24 hrs . Highly suggest buying these , will not disappoint 💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Standard pillow good size, BUT VERY hard for a memory foam pillow. Very little "give" to the foam pillow. Bought a 2 pack, opened one pillow so couldn't return the items. Will use as an extra bed top decorator pillow instead of using as a head pillow. Very disappointed.Pillow barely fit into a standard pillow case.Delivery service was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these pillows! They are perfect for every sleeping position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly confortable, recomendable 1000%.
reviews.reviewText: These pillos are so confortable and they keep cool. Exceeded my expectations.

Acheter pour en cadeau pour mon conjoint qui a tres mal au cou. J'ai dû retirer beaucoup de gel a l'intérieur. Elles etait beaucoup trop grosse. Pour l'instant mon conjoint la trouve très confortable. L'avenir nous dira si elles vont améliorées ses douleurs au cou, mais les oreillers sont bien fait et de bonne qualité

Cet oreiller est exceptionnel. J ai toujours eu un sommeil difficile, difficulté à trouver la bonne position pour dormir, je bouge beaucoup, trouver la bonne hauteur et fermeté de l oreiller.. avec Cet oreiller j ai pu dormir confortablement sur le dos et sur le côté. Le rembourrage adaptable m à permis de trouver la bonne hauteur pour moi. Ses coins pointu et arrondit m ont permis de soutenir ma nuque quand je suis sur le côté. J ai dormi pour la première fois depuis des années comme un bébé. Il est ni trop ferme ni trop mou et c est un bonheur. Je le recommande sans hésitation.

At first I was disapointed but after reading some comments I realise you have to wait for it to become fullerIt was very thin I tought I would have to buy extra fillingUsually if it's memory foam like a mattress as soon as you get out of the package it becomes fuller
Excellent manufacture and supportive and comfortable...
